english.segment1: You're cold that way. And that's why you say. The things that you say. You can't attract. The things that you lack. You're trying in vain
english.segment2: Chorus: It seems it's always the crazy times. You find you'll wake up and realize. It takes more than your saline eyes. To make things right
english.segment3: You spiral down. You've broken your crown. You don't feel like a queen. You've seen the proof. But you're still crying wolf. You'll never believe
english.segment5: You try to climb a broken ladder. Grip the missing rungs. And fall down, down, down. Seems sometime ago you said. This wouldn't last. And now you sit here crying
english.segment6: Beside your bed. You feel left for dead. You kneel in the dark..
english.segment7: It takes more than your saline eyes. To make things right
